LET'S GET STARTED
Dream. Learn.
Conquer. Thrive.
Gwendolyn Parker is a multi-award winning Licensed
Real Estate professional with over 25 years of
experience helping families achieve economic and
financial success. A public servant and proud mother of
two, to Jasmine and Julian, as well as a beloved family
member and mentor to many.Gwendolyn holds a
Bachelor of Science Degree in Sociology and Human
Services from Henderson State University and also
began pre-licensure studies in Family Therapy. She
obtained her Real Estate License from the Broadway
School of Real Estate in 20xx and is currently licensed in
the States of Arkansas and Georgia.
501.612.8445 Gwendolynparker@Kw.Com
Courses
Course 1
Discover what satisfied clients have to say about their coaching experience with Gwendolyn. Their stories and testimonials speak to the transformative power of her coaching services. We take pride in guiding individuals towards achieving their personal and professional goals. Don't just take our word for it; hear from those who have experienced the positive impact of her coaching firsthand.
